metadata.title: CVE-2017-7493 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Quick Emulator (Qemu) built with the VirtFS, host directory sharing via Plan 9 File System(9pfs) support, is vulnerable to an improper access control issue. It could occur while accessing virtfs metadata files in mapped-file security mode. A guest user could use this flaw to escalate their privileges inside guest.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.10+dfsg-0ubuntu1').
